## Accommodation

Students will be provided with on campus accommodation. 
<!--Each room will be en suite with access to a shared kitchen and communal space. All bed linen will be provided and washed weekly.-->



## Catering


All meals (breakfast, lunch and dinner) will be provided as well as tea, coffee and biscuit breaks throughout the day.

The campus includes a shop which will provide all additional food and any essentials.
